column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text='' I wanted to go shopping downtown , so I decided to take the public bus .
#id=2
#text=I waited at the bus stop where other people were also waiting .
#id=3
#text=The bus came right on time and pulled over to the curb .
#id=4
#text=I waited for the people getting off the bus to step down .
#id=5
#text=Then I waited in line as each person got on .
#id=6
#text=When it was my turn I stepped up the few steps into front of the bus .
#id=7
#text=I swiped my bus card to pay , smiled at the driver , and chose a seat .
#id=8
#text=The bus was a little crowded , so I stood and held onto the bar .
#id=9
#text=An elderly woman got on the bus next , and a younger person got up to give her his seat .
#text=When everyone was on , the bus put on his turn signal and pulled back into the street .
#text=As I got closer to my stop , I pulled the cord .
#text=The cord dinged to signal that I wanted to get off .
#text=The bus pulled into the stop where other people were waiting to get on .
#text=They waited until I got off before boarding .
